name: 胡憲倫
objective:
瞭解生命週期思維 (Life Cycle Thinking) 與生命週期管理 (LCM) 對環境問題解決的重要性；學會生命週期評估 (LCA) 的原理及方法，並學會如何評估產品每個生命週期階段的環境及社會衝擊；學習 LCA 的軟體操作及其應用；學會應用 LCA 來解決環境問題及政策制定，包括產品環境化設計、碳足跡及碳標籤等。
To understand how Life Cycle Thinking and Life Cycle Management can solve environmental problems. Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), one of the most important tools for analyzing and assessing environmental problems will be taught during the course of the semester. Students will also be learning a popular LCA software, SimaPro. Various applications related to LCA, such as carbon footprinting and labeling, and eco-design will also be practiced in the class.
schedule:
1.　　生命週期評估概論－I (Introduction of Life Cycle Assessment I)：歷史、發展與應用 (history, development, and application)
2.　　放假一周
3.　　生命週期評估方法論概要－I (Methodology of LCA- I)：目標範疇界定與盤查分析 (Goal and Scope definition and inventory analysis)
4.　　生命週期評估方法論概要－II (Methodology of LCA- II)：盤查分析與軟體操作 (inventory analysis and software, Simapro)
5.　　生命週期評估方法論概要－III (Methodology of LCA- III)：衝擊評估方法學 (methodology of LCIA)
6.　　生命週期評估方法論概要－IV (Methodology of LCA- IV)：衝擊評估方法學 (methodology of LCIA)
7.　　放假一周
8.　　生命週期評估方法論概要－VII (Methodology of LCA- VII)：不確定性、敏感度分析與闡釋 (uncertainty, sensitivity analysis and interpretation)
9.　　期中考 (Mid-term Exam)
10.　　分組報告－完成一項產品 / 服務的 LCA
11.　　其他類型的 LCA (other LCA)：生命週期成本、社會生命週期評估與組織生命週期評估 (Life cycle costing (LCCs), social LCA, and organizational LCA)
12.　　LCA 應用 (LCA Applications)：環境宣告與標籤 (environmental declarations and Labels)
13.　　LCA 應用 (LCA Applications)：綠色製程、產品設計與發展 (Green Processes, Product Design and Development)
14.　　LCA 展望 (LCA outlook)：
15.　　Special Topic: 碳足跡、淨零及碳中和 (Carbon Footprinting, Net Zero and Carbon Neutrality)
16.　　Special Topic: Natural Capital Accounting and LCA
17.　　專題報告－分組簡報 Team Project Presentation
18.　　專題報告－分組簡報 Team Project Presentation
scorePolicy:
